description: As a Fullstack Engineer I support the Atlas team in the further development of internal data web applications.

projects.title: Swisscom Data Console
projects.description: Swisscom Data Console is an interal tool to work with big data, we maintained and developed the GUI for it, so there is a user friendly interaction available. There I have worked to implement different features, fix bugs and make the platform an better website.

projects.title: Compass
projects.description: Is an fork of the offical open-source web-app that was adjusted to use it for interacting with big data.

description: Through my work in the Apps team, I have acquired in-depth knowledge of JavaScript, TypeScript, NestJs, MariaDB and React. I was able to actively participate in a large number of customer projects and realize some of them completely independently. This enabled me to acquire skills from planning to development.

projects.title: Swisscom Event Planning Tool
projects.description: This project involved creating a website to display various upcoming events. The goal was to place these displays at the entrance of the offices, allowing employees to view upcoming events. I worked entirely independently on this customer project. To achieve this, I planned a comprehensive database schema, which formed the foundation for developing the backend of the website. The backend was built using NestJS and PrismaORM, with API documentation created using Swagger. Once the backend was complete, I developed the frontend based on mockups provided by the designers. The frontend was built using React, Tailwind CSS, and TypeScript.

projects.title: Compass
projects.description: Is an fork of the offical open-source web-app that was adjusted to use it for interacting with big data.

description: Support of the Managed Mac Service from A to Z, development of bash scripts, deployment of new operating system and application releases (macOS), work in 3rd level support (OneITSM). Mainly involved with bash scripts, such as development, administration and deployment.

projects.title: Set Outlook as default mail client
projects.description: Automated the process to set the default mail client to outlook without the need of the login for apple's mail client

projects.title: Remove Apple ID before erasing Mac
projects.description: Automated the loggout process in case of erasing the Mac.

projects.title: Reactivate FileVault on Mac
